title: An improved deep convolutional neural network-based YouTube video classification using textual features
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Ali Raza, Faizan Younas, Hafeez Ur Rehman Siddiqui, Furqan Rustam, Monica Gracia Villar, Eduardo Silva Alvarado, Imran Ashraf
